content.21: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.
content.22: And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,
content.23: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.

content.25: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer-sheba, all the days of Solomon.
content.26: And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.
content.27: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.

content.29: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that
content.30: And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.
content.31: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
content.32: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.
